name: Elemental Assassin
description:
Use VR controls to manipulate the earth itself and figure out one of many ways to sneak or fight your way into a heavily guarded keep to retrieve the holy grail.

The level was designed to offer unique challenges depending on what element you use (fire, water, and air), and I may expand on it to include other elements and levels in the future. For now it offers about 5-10 minutes of game-play. It's current state should be considered a demo. 

If you play it, I would really appreciate hearing how you liked it and getting any feedback you have!
